tasks.name: 2nd Newsletter Creation and Marketing T.E.A.M. Support
Chuy's reimbusement for Hubspot spendings
tasks.description:
For the last months, Chuy and Manu have paid our Hubspot subscription out of their own pockets with this reimbursement in mind.

So far the spending for 3 months has been:

**March**: $60.49 (paid by Chuy)

**April**: $60.49 (paid by Manu)

May: $60.49 (paid by Manu)

\
On top of this we would like to request $450 to pay for the 9 months left in our 1-year subscription, which will be handled by Manu.

tasks.name: Manu's reimbursement for Hubspot spendings + funding for 1 year
tasks.description:
For the last months, Chuy and Manu have paid our Hubspot subscription out of their own pockets with this reimbursement in mind.

On top of this we would like to request $450 to pay for the 9 months left in our 1-year subscription, which will be handled by Manu.

tasks.name: Week May 2 - 8
tasks.description: # [Discord broken link fix #42](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/tec-web/pull/42) ### Problem All Discord links that redirected to [discord.tecommons.org](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/tec-web/pull/discord.tecommons.org) were broken. ### Fix Changed all references of [discord.tecommons.org](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/tec-web/pull/discord.tecommons.org) to . \ # [Nitfix for emails already registered for newsletter #43](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/tec-web/pull/43) \ ## What changed? When a user is already registered for the newsletter and they try register once again on the website now notifies the user that they are already signed in. | Normal error message | Already registered error message | |----|----| | | | \

tasks.name: Week April 11 - 15
tasks.description: # Working Groups update and TEC Handbook link correction \ # Working Groups Update ## What's added? ### Rewards working group card (see issue [#1241](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/coordination/issues/1241)) | Normal | On Hover | |----|----| | | | ## What's removed? ### Params and Commons Swarm working group card (see issue [#1241](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/coordination/issues/1241)) | Parameters | Commons Swarm | |----|----| | | | ## What's modified? ### Stewards and Soft Gov meetings traded places (see issue [#1241](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/coordination/issues/1241)): * Stewards take place on Tuesdays at 7pm CET. * Soft Gov take place on Wednesdays at 7pm CET. \ # TEC Handbook Link Correction ## What's modified? ### Link corrections (see issue [#1229](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/coordination/issues/1229) and tec-web:issue #40 ): * TEC Handbook buttons now points to the correct [link](https://token-engineering-commons.gitbook.io/tec-handbook/). * Medium link now points to the [TEC profile](https://medium.com/token-engineering-commons). \

tasks.name: Week Feb 14 - Feb 18
tasks.description:
# "How to get $TEC" button added for the [TEC Website](https://tecommons.org/)
### A [Pull Request](https://github.com/CommonsSwarm/tec-convert/pull/62) was made for this issue:

A button that redirects to [this link](https://token-engineering-commons.gitbook.io/tec-handbook/how-to-purchase-usdtec) was inserted in the bottom left corner.

## Desktop View:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28935185/152496351-12746194-472c-4450-8253-725857b45483.png) 

## Mobile View:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28935185/152496390-17898eeb-4435-480f-93b5-758d8f27a33a.png)

tasks.name: Week Feb 21 - Feb 25
tasks.description: # Updated the Mision Vision and Values for the [TEC Website](https://tecommons.org/) The change was requested on the [issue #1139](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/coordination/issues/1139) and a [Pull Request](https://github.com/CommonsBuild/tec-web/pull/39) was made regarding this change: ## Mission The mission text is updated to what the [TEC Handbook](https://token-engineering-commons.gitbook.io/tec-handbook/what-is-the-tec/mission-vision-and-values) says about the mission. ## Vision and Values The Vision and Values from the [TEC Handbook](https://token-engineering-commons.gitbook.io/tec-handbook/what-is-the-tec/mission-vision-and-values) have been added as a box of text similar to the Mission.
